document_data.name: ''Rilantaver's staff''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rilantaver's staff''''' was a type of [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] [[staff]] created by the [[Rilantaver|wizard]] after which it was named.{{Cite dragon/173/Bazaar of the Bizarre: A wizard's staff is to lean on}}
document_data.Powers: This staff offered ''+3 protection'' for up to six creatures who touched it,{{Cite dragon/173/Bazaar of the Bizarre: A wizard's staff is to lean on}}
document_data.Origins: Many of these staves were crafted in the nation of [[Amn]] and in the city of [[Starmantle]], where Rilanter operated a business to finance his more dubious travels and endeavors.
